snippet: St. John’s (40-21) beat North Carolina, 9-5, to advance to the College World Series super regionals for the first time.
abstract: St John's baseball team defeats North Carolina, 9-5, to advance to College World Series super regional for the first time; other college baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: St. John’s (40-21) beat North Carolina, 9-5, to advance to the College World Series super regionals for the first time.

headline.seo: St. John’s Advance to College Baseball Super Regional
headline.main: St. John’s Advance to Baseball Super Regional
